message:
We come to a street lined with extravagant villas.

Even here, there's something of a class system. The buildings range from palatial mansions to smaller, but still nice, houses.
We're staying in one of the latter, a small two-story building at the end of the block.
Compared to the other buildings, ours looks a bit older.
There's a plate with the word "GLITTER" above the door.
The neighboring building has a different word above its door, so I assume that must be its name.
I hold my Coil up to the screen next to the door and turn the old-fashioned doorknob.
When I step inside, my eyes go wide.
The interior is even more old-fashioned than I expected from the outside... Maybe "classic" is a better word.
Most of the furniture is made of wood, a sharp contrast to the pure white world outside.
There's a staircase in the back. After giving the first floor a once-over, I decide to check out the second floor.
At the top of the stairs, I find a nice den. It even has a small bar counter.
Next to it is a hallway lined with doors. I check out one of the rooms.
